conbody.p: The inclusive VT website looks well put together with strong topics in the toolbar and
mostly informative sections throughout the website. However I feel there is some room
for improvement. The events category is kind of dry, instead of just being a bulleted
list you could add some information on a few events to inform the reader about the
specifics of the event. Similarly the announcements section offers a list of recent
announcement, to help improve that page there could be links to the new articles or
videos, so the user can gain access to these announcements directly from the page. I
would also recommend this for the DiversityEdu page so users can look through the site
on their own, and any other sections where an outside source is referenced, for example
the social media section in the Strong Together Initiative.
In addition to adding links I would recommend adding some more photos to the sections
that are lacking in information, this would help with the design of the website and help
with the viewers interest in the topic. Overall the website has plenty of information on
Inclusive VT and the facets that are involved, but the addition of links and images may
